alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Johnson; Northwest Carter; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 05 at 1:52AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following areas, Cocke Smoky Mountains, Hamblen, Hancock, Hawkins, Johnson, Northwest Carter, Northwest Cocke, Northwest Greene, Southeast Carter, Southeast Greene, Sullivan, Unicoi and Washington TN. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following areas, Lee, Russell, Scott VA, Washington VA and Wise. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of heavy rainfall are expected today, which may result in flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Johnson; Northwest Carter; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
